Play.Header: DEN wins toss, elects to Receive, and DAL elects to defend the North goal.

This is the second time in club history the Cowboys have played an overtime game on Thanksgiving Day. The first OT game was a 44-38 loss to Minnesota on Nov. 26, 1987. 3-B.Cundiff kicks 65 yards from DAL 30 to DEN 5. 27-Da.Williams to DEN 32 for 27 yards (33-N.Jones). Return middle.
Denver Broncos at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:53)
